elements.name: question1
elements.title: What are the advantages of the branch principle?
elements.correctAnswer: Joint bulk purchasing (volume discounts); cost-cutting, central warehouse management (favorable location); uniform business policy (low administrative effort, hiring of specialists, large-scale distribution of advertising, shifting of goods)

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What do you mean by the discount principle?
elements.correctAnswer: The discount principle is a combative pricing policy with branded products.

elements.name: question3

One advantage of branch operations is centralized management by specialists.
One disadvantage of chain stores is the higher cost of inventory management.
The branch principle has the disadvantage that you reach fewer customers.
Discount stores usually operate according to the branch principle.
